name: GhostWay
description:
-- INTRO --

Game made in 6 weeks for a school project. "An elegant game design in an abstract world"

-- PITCH --

Play as an entity that can travel from cube to cube.  Watch carefully and be responsive to complete challenges as fast as possible !

Use your mouse to aim and click where you want to move.
Use S to slow down time
Use F to get back to your last position
Use Space to make a vertical jump

-- CREDITS --

Game Designer : Hubert de BUYER - https://twitter.com/MixBulfreak
Game Designer: Camille Chiurazzi -- https://twitter.com/Kaily_krly
Tech : Italo Pardave
Level Designer : Elisa Russo - https://twitter.com/russoelisa
Game  Artist : Jordan Untereiner - https://twitter.com/jordan42130
Game Artist : Félix Maudru
Q&A Tester:  Alexandre Zandecki - https://twitter.com/ZandeckiAlex
